places.name: SEYTECH NG | Web Design Agency in Nigeria
places.address: SEYTECH NG | Web Design Agency in Nigeria, A3080, Tejuosho Shopping Complex Lagos, Lagos
places.about: Seytech is a leading Digital agency in Nigeria, with a focus on Web Development, Logo and Branding, Design, 3d Animation, SEO and Digital Marketing.

detailed_reviews.review: SeyTech is highly reliable. I recommend thier services 10/10. Logo designs, invitation cards, website and social media traffic.
I love the work I got. Very professional with good communications.
Really great to rely on a service and they never disappoint

places.name: Timest Web - Website Design Company
places.address: Timest Web - Website Design Company, 13 Asa-Afariogun St, Isolo, Lagos 100263, Lagos
places.about:
Timest Web is a Web Development & IT Consulting company based in Lagos, Nigeria.
We are web experts. A team of designers, developers, marketers, and strategists who identify problems and provide solutions.

detailed_reviews.review: Trustworthy company. Always reliable. I have used them for over 3 years now to manage all my business and personal websites. When you call they are always ready to deliver. All of their work is always exceptional quality. The founder of the company has great work ethics and I will definitely be a returning customer. Excellent Service always.

I really have a very good experience with Timest web. They are professional in what they do. Customer satisfaction in their priority. The have a very good customer service.The most important thing I love about their service was that, They are always available to answer all my questions and clarify all my doubts 24/7.

Timest Web is an exceptional website design company. They did an amazing job and I strongly recommend them. The customer service was great. Deji is very professional, respectful and trustworthy. You can trust him to complete the job in a timely manner. I'm so glad I chose Timest Web. Thank you so much for a job well done!
Times web did a great job for me. My website looks exactly how I wanted it, they were very patient with me and acted on all instructions spontaneously. I recommend them  don't look further

Deji and TIMEST the Web Team have been such a wonderful experience. The customer service and attention to detail is amazing! We at Turner Global Enterprises in the United States definitely recommend their services and team for all your website needs and requirements.

Deji is definitely the best web designer! He was efficient, always responded to all my questions and concerns, very comprehensive, and just an overall fantastic job! He exceeded my expectations! I will definitely do more business in the future. Thank you! I love my website

I came across this company by mere searching on Instagram. Before now, I have lost thousands of pounds looking for web designer and manager. While some took my money and didn't deliver at all, some delivered half baked job.
But everything changed with Deji of Timest.He is so kind, very reassuring,  proactive and also reactive. And oh! Yes, he knows his onions.
He is ever ready to assist anytime of the day or night.

Deji has great communication skill. There was clear communication of what my expectations were and what Timest could offer in achieving them. Deji wrote a clear plan on how to achieve them and ticked them each time anyone of them was achieved. So it was visual.  There was no " I thought you were going to do this or I thought this was what we said, there was no "thoughting" at anytime.

I loved that I was involved all through the process. Once they began working with me. Deji opened a WhatsApp group with me and Damilola. This ensured smooth communication.

Deji is very open and honest. There was a time he was to pay for something. But he sent me the receipt of the company's quote.  He could have just given me any price and there was no one way I would have known.

Deji has the customer best interest at heart as he will guide you into choosing cheaper option that will meet your need.

I was beyond satisfied with their customer service.

I can't recommend them enough.

Thank you Deji
Thank you Damilola
Thank you Timest web

Timest Web, Oh My God you guys did a wonderful job, no regrets at all. You are professionals who gives top notch services. Thank you so much for Omo Online Stores it's definitely a dream come through, exactly what I wanted. Thank you so much. Did I mention customer service is amazing, keep the great work.

places.name: Akinz Smart Technologies | Website Design Company in Lagos State, Nigeria.
places.address: Akinz Smart Technologies | Website Design Company in Lagos State, Nigeria., 6, Adepele Street, Computer Village, Ikeja, Lagos Mike Alia Street, Ahmadiyya St, Alimosho, Lagos 100282, Lagos
places.about: Our aim as a digital marketing company is to help start-ups, businesses and entrepreneurs gain brand credibility, reach the right audience, optimize and obtain better conversion rates and make more sales through our services [WEBSITE DESIGNING And DIGITAL MARKETING

detailed_reviews.review: Akinz Smart Technologies is really good at what he does. He makes website design like a tell tale that captivates the mind right from the top to the bottom page. I'd recommend him anytime.

@Akinz smart technology company, I have a company that is top notch in developing individuals in website designing,digital marketing strategies and also help startups/companies reach their target audience and make more sales. What more can one ask for? Thanks Akinz smart technologies
It's nice using the Akinz Smart Technologies brand. You can make a trial as well,and you won't have a course to regret at all.

Wow, @Akinz Smart Technologies this this really fantastic and am excited because I really need your services and will also be needing your services for other businesses I am making plans to start soon. That's for this great initiative.
If ever in search of a beautiful Web site page and design with access to easy navigation around, I will recommend you use Akinz Smart technologies and you would have no regrets what so ever.
Thank you Smart Technologies for being one of the dedicated and sincere persons. I enjoyed working with you and I'd recommend you to anyone who'd  need a sincere and committed person to work with.
I couldn't stop to gush over the landing page I got from them. It's so beautiful, colourful, and well arranged not complicated at all. Also, very easy to navigate.
This brand is an expert in Web Designing & Digital Marketing. Don't hesitate to patronize them. Trust me, a trial will convince you.
